info.title: Infoblox MICROSOFTSERVER API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI MICROSOFTSERVER objects

get.description: Returns a list of msserver objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address or FQDN of the server.

parameters.name: grid_member
parameters.description: eference to the assigned grid member

get.description: Returns a specific msserver object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific msserver object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific msserver object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of msserver:adsites:domain objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: ea_definition
parameters.description: The name of the Extensible Attribute Definition object that is linked to the Active Directory Sites Domain.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Active Directory Domain properties object.

parameters.name: netbios
parameters.description: The NetBIOS name of the Active Directory Domain properties object.

parameters.name: network_view
parameters.description: The name of the network view in which the Active Directory Domain resides.

get.description: Returns a specific msserver:adsites:domain object by reference
Returns a list of msserver:adsites:site objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The reference to the Active Directory Domain to which the site belongs.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the site properties object for the Active Directory Sites.

get.description: Returns a specific msserver:adsites:site object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific msserver:adsites:site object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific msserver:adsites:site object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of msserver:dhcp objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address or FQDN of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

get.description: Returns a specific msserver:dhcp object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific msserver:dhcp object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific msserver:dhcp object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of msserver:dns objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address or FQDN of the DNS Microsoft Server.

get.description: Returns a specific msserver:dns object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific msserver:dns object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific msserver:dns object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of mssuperscope objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Microsoft DHCP superscope.

parameters.name: network_view
parameters.description: The name of the network view in which the superscope resides.

get.description: Returns a specific mssuperscope object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific mssuperscope object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific mssuperscope object by reference

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

ad_domain.description: The Active Directory domain to which this server belongs (if applicable).

address.description: The address or FQDN of the server.

comment.description: User comments for this Microsoft Server

connection_status.description: Result of the last RPC connection attempt made

connection_status_detail.description: Detail of the last connection attempt made

disabled.description: Allow/forbids usage of this Microsoft Server

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

grid_member.description: eference to the assigned grid member

last_seen.description: Timestamp of the last message received

log_destination.description: Directs logging of sync messages either to syslog or mslog

log_level.description: Log level for this Microsoft Server

login_name.description: Microsoft Server login name, with optional domainname

managing_member.description: Hostname of grid member managing this Microsoft Server

ms_max_connection.description: Maximum number of connections to MS server

ms_rpc_timeout_in_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds of RPC connections for this MS Server

read_only.description: Enable read-only management for this Microsoft Server

root_ad_domain.description: The root Active Directory domain to which this server belongs (if applicable).

server_name.description: Gives the server name as reported by itself

synchronization_min_delay.description: Minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations

synchronization_status_detail.description: Detail status if synchronization_status is ERROR

use_log_destination.description: Override log_destination inherited from grid level

use_ms_rpc_timeout_in_seconds.description: Flag to override cluster RPC timeout

use_default_ip_site_link.description: Flag to override MS Server default IP site link

default_ip_site_link.description: Default IP site link for sites created from NIOS

use_login.description: Flag to override login name and password from the MS Server

login_name.description: Microsoft Server login name, with optional

use_synchronization_min_delay.description: Flag to override synchronization interval from the MS Server

synchronization_min_delay.description: Minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations

use_ldap_timeout.description: Flag to override cluster LDAP timeoutMS Server

ldap_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for LDAP connections for this MS Server

ldap_auth_port.description: TCP port for LDAP connections for this

ldap_encryption.description: Encryption for LDAP connections for this MS Server

managed.description: Controls whether the Sites of this MS Server are to be synchronized by the assigned managing member or not

read_only.description: Enable/disable read-only synchronization of Sites for this Active Directory domain

last_sync_ts.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization attempt

last_sync_status.description: Status of the last synchronization attempt

last_sync_detail.description: The detailed status of the last synchronization attempt.

supports_ipv6.description: Flag indicating if the server supports IPv6

login_name.description: The login name of the Microsoft Server.

login_password.description: The login password of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

enable_user_sync.description: Determines whether the Active Directory user synchronization is enabled or not.

synchronization_interval.description: The minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations.

last_sync_time.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization attempt.

last_sync_status.description: The status of the last synchronization attempt.

last_sync_detail.description: The detailed status of the last synchronization attempt.

last_success_sync_time.description: Timestamp of the last successful synchronization attempt.

use_login.description: Flag to override login name and password from MS server

use_enable_ad_user_sync.description: Flag to override AD User sync from grid level

use_synchronization_min_delay.description: Flag to override synchronization interval from the MS Server

use_login.description: Flag to override login name and password from the MS Server

managed.description: flag indicating if the DNS service is managed

next_sync_control.description: Defines what control to apply on the DNS server

status.description: Status of the Microsoft DNS Service

use_enable_monitoring.description: Override enable monitoring inherited from grid level

enable_monitoring.description: Flag indicating if the DNS service is monitored and controlled

use_enable_invalid_mac.description: Override setting for Enable Invalid Mac Address

supports_failover.description: Flag indicating if the DHCP supports Failover

use_synchronization_min_delay.description: Flag to override synchronization interval from the MS Server

synchronization_min_delay.description: Minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations

use_login.description: Flag to override login name and password from the MS Server

managed.description: flag indicating if the DNS service is managed

next_sync_control.description: Defines what control to apply on the DNS server

status.description: Status of the Microsoft DNS Service

status_detail.description: Detailed status of the DNS status

last_sync_ts.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization attempt

last_sync_status.description: Status of the last synchronization attempt

last_sync_detail.description: Detailled status of the last synchronization attempt

forwarders.description: Ordered list of IP addresses to forward queries to

supports_ipv6.description: Flag indicating if the server supports IPv6

supports_ipv6_reverse.description: Flag indicating if the server supports reverse IPv6 zones

supports_rr_dname.description: Flag indicating if the server supports DNAME records

supports_dnssec.description: Flag indicating if the server supports

supports_active_directory.description: Flag indicating if the server supports AD integrated zones

supports_rr_naptr.description: Flag indicating if the server supports NAPTR records

use_enable_monitoring.description: Override enable monitoring inherited from grid level

enable_monitoring.description: Flag indicating if the DNS service is monitored and controlled

use_synchronization_min_delay.description: Flag to override synchronization interval from the MS Server

synchronization_min_delay.description: Minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations

use_enable_dns_reports_sync.description: Override enable reports data inherited from grid level

enable_dns_reports_sync.description: Enable or Disable MS DNS data for reports from this MS Server

address.description: The address or FQDN of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

dhcp_utilization.description: The percentage of the total DHCP utilization of DHCP objects belonging to the DHCP Microsoft Server multiplied by 1000. This is the percentage of the total number of available IP addresses from all the DHCP objects belonging to the DHCP Microsoft Server versus the total number of all IP addresses in all of the DHCP objects on the DHCP Microsoft Server.

dhcp_utilization_status.description: A string describing the utilization level of DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

dynamic_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP leases issued for the DHCP objects on the DHCP Microsoft Server.

last_sync_ts.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization attempt

login_name.description: The login name of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

login_password.description: The login password of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

next_sync_control.description: Defines what control to apply on the DHCP server

read_only.description: Whether Microsoft server is read only

static_hosts.description: The number of static DHCP addresses configured in DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

status.description: Status of the Microsoft DHCP Service

status_detail.description: Detailed status of the DHCP status

supports_failover.description: Flag indicating if the DHCP supports Failover

synchronization_interval.description: The minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations.

total_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP addresses configured in DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

login_password.description: The login password of the DNS Microsoft Server.

synchronization_interval.description: The minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations.

dhcp_utilization.description: The percentage of the total DHCP usage of the ranges in the superscope.

dhcp_utilization_status.description: Utilization level of the DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

disable.description: Determines whether the superscope is disabled.

dynamic_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP leases issued for the DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

high_water_mark.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage after which an alarm will be active.

high_water_mark_reset.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage after which an alarm will be reset.

low_water_mark.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage below which an alarm will be active.

low_water_mark_reset.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage below which an alarm will be reset.

name.description: The name of the Microsoft DHCP superscope.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which the superscope resides.

ranges.description: The list of DHCP ranges that are associated with the superscope.

static_hosts.description: The number of static DHCP addresses configured in DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

total_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP addresses configured in DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.
